basic_info.description: I'm Gauransh Sawhney, a full-stack software engineer and graduate student at Virginia Tech (MS Computer Engineering). I specialize in building scalable backend services, AI/ML solutions, and interactive frontend applications. With experience across Python, Java, React, JavaScript and modern DevOps practices, I've shipped production systems serving 100K+ users and trained deep learning models for real-world applications. I'm passionate about solving complex technical problems and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

projects.title: AI-Powered Portfolio
projects.highlight: React-based, client-orchestrated RAG system for resume and GitHub insights
projects.description: Built a React-based, client-orchestrated RAG system to answer recruiter and technical questions over resume and GitHub repositories using OpenAI LLMs. Implemented LangChain-based retrieval and prompt orchestration on the frontend, including document chunking, embedding generation, and semantic vector search to enable grounded responses. Designed a lightweight agentic loop for tool selection, context planning, and response generation, balancing answer quality, latency, and token usage within browser constraints.

projects.title: Vision-Controlled Flappy Bird
projects.highlight: Real-time gesture control via computer vision
projects.description: Real-time computer vision system mapping hand motion to game control via webcam (MATLAB). Implemented HSV segmentation, binary masking, frame-to-frame transitions for flapping gesture detection under varying lighting. Integrated perception, UI, and game logic into real-time loop.

projects.title: Gray to Glory: Analysis of Image Coloration Models
projects.highlight: Deep learning model comparison achieving 5% MAE improvement
projects.description: Automatic image colorization via deep learning (CNN, U-Net, ResNet 18, GANs). Improved color fidelity: MAE 0.0848→0.0807, LPIPS 0.132→0.148.

projects.title: Hierarchical Modelling for Sparse Labelled Data
projects.highlight: RoBERTa NLP classifier achieving 99% accuracy on sparse data
projects.description: RoBERTa model classifying Not-for-Profit tweets (99% accuracy) and Call-for-Grants tweets (94% accuracy). Data augmentation via similarity metrics.

projects.title: Semantic Image Segmentation Challenge
projects.highlight: Satellite image vegetation extraction using U-Net + ResNet34
projects.description: U-Net with ResNet34 encoder extracting vegetation cover from satellite images (fastai). Preprocessed multi-class masks to binary segmentations. IoU 0.404.

projects.title: DaanCorona: Voucher Platform
projects.highlight: Full-stack donation platform supporting local businesses during COVID
projects.description: Voucher platform for donations to small businesses during COVID (React web, Android app, Django backend). Redeemable post-lockdown.

projects.title: BOSM Roulette
projects.highlight: Sports betting app with 500+ downloads for college fest
projects.description: Sports betting platform for college fest matches (Android, Firebase). 500+ downloads.

experience.title: Graduate Research Assistant
experience.description: Designed and trained a PyTorch-based U-Net with FiLM conditioning to predict 5G coverage maps for transmitter–RIS wireless scenarios. Achieved an RMSE of 0.038 on the USC dataset, establishing the first baseline for transmitter–RIS scenarios.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern (EDG)
experience.description: Built an Agent Performance dashboard using JavaScript and UI Builder used by 20+ IAT teams to monitor agent performance, SLA compliance, and incident resolution trends. Integrated data from incidents, surveys, and service catalogs into a unified source of truth.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: Owned and shipped a backend service (Ruby + REST) to track last-access timestamps for end-user devices, powering device-health metrics for 100K+ enterprise users. Built a full-stack feature using JavaScript, React, and GlideRecord to visualize application network hops, helping enterprise administrators diagnose connectivity issues faster. Queried and aggregated high-volume time-series data from a RocksDB-backed time-series database, using SQL, for real-time prformance dashboards. Automated UI regression test suites using Selenium and Java, reducing manual QA effort by ∼30% and preventing regressions prior to production release.

experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: Worked with Vision Transformers for Unsupervised Domain Adaptation (UDA) on the Office-Home dataset. Trained models on augmented images with feature mixup in intermediate layers, achieving a 1% improvement over existing baselines.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Built backend data pipelines using Flask, Celery, and PostgreSQL to compute and surface trending meme tag metrics, supporting real-time content ranking. Developed a gRPC microservice powered by DistilBERT (PyTorch) to generate semantic query synonyms, improving search relevance. Integrated ElasticSearch for affinity vector matching, enhancing recommendation relevance in search flows.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Designed and built Android app UI (Landing, Onboarding, Login/SignUp) using Kotlin in Android Studio.

experience.company: Smart I Electronic Systems Pvt Ltd
experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Developed an object detection API using YOLO v3 model built with Tensorflow and Keras to detect pedestrians in an image and return details of detected objects. The backend for server was built using Flask.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Engineering

education.school: Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Electical and Electronics Engineering
